QUESTION.NAME: 1-Introduction

P.FONT: Welcome to the Mobile Bar Association Volunteer Lawyers Program (VLP) online interview. This interview will let you apply for help from the VLP.

You will be asked to provide details on your household finances during this interview. Please make sure you have information about income and expenses for all members of your household before you begin.
You must fill in the items with red labels to continue to the next screen.
Click 'Begin' to start.
Please click on the 'Learn More' button throughout the interview if you need help.

QUESTION.LEARN: What does the "Learn More" button do?

P.FONT: Completing this interview does not mean that the Volunteer Lawyers Program has accepted your case. VLP cannot represent everyone who applies for help. VLP cases must meet certain established guidelines.
Click 'Yes' if you understand this and want to apply. Click 'No' if you do not agree.
Please tell me your name and gender.

FIELD.NAME: Client name prefix MC
FIELD.INVALIDPROMPT: You must make a selection from the highlighted space before you can continue.

FIELD.INVALIDPROMPT: You must type a response in the highlighted space before you can continue.

FIELD.INVALIDPROMPT: You must type a response in the highlighted space before you can continue.

QUESTION.NAME: 4-Marketing

P.FONT: How did you hear about the Mobile Volunteer Lawyers Program?

We want to know how people find out about our services. If you were told by a friend, put that here. If you searched online, at www.google.com for example, put in what you searched for and where. We want as many people as possible to know about our services.
